ABOUT THE ROYAL MINT GOLD [RMG] BLOCKCHAIN

The Royal Mint created Royal Mint Gold (RMG), the world's first 100% gold-backed blockchain. RMG is built on Prova™ and will trade at CME Group providing low cost ownership of gold, instant transfer of gold around the world, & gold price discovery never before possible. Learn More

SAFE

Controlled participation & user protections ensure the integrity of the blockchain.

VERSATILE

Open source software that can be crafted to trade any asset under any rule set.

EFFICIENT

Digitize any asset and trade with transparent ownership, reduced costs and global availability.

THE RMG BLOCKCHAIN IS DESIGNED FOR SAFETY FROM THE GROUND UP:

  • All wallets are multi-signature. Security experts have long recognized the value of multi-signature wallets. Single-key losses are not possible on the RMG blockchain.
  • No “black holes”. Due to the way the blockchain enforces keys, it is impossible to send funds to an invalid address where the RMG could not be recovered.
  • All parties participating on the network are identified before being allowed to transact.
  • The blockchain exclusively utilizes trusted, proven technology. It does not contain smart contracts, experimental cryptographic functions, or algorithms that have not already been heavily tested and proven in existing blockchain systems.
